name: JellyPy
description: JellyPy automatically manages your Sonarr and Radarr monitoring based on what you watch in Jellyfin.
overview: Automatically manage Sonarr & Radarr monitoring based on your Jellyfin watch activity.

versions.changelog:
**Version 2.1.0.0 - Global Interpreter Configuration & Enhanced Validation**

**New Features:**
• Global configuration for Python and Bash executable paths
• Configurable interpreter paths in Global Settings with test buttons
• Robust executable path validation with enhanced error messages
• File permission verification during executable testing
• Human-readable file size formatting (B, KB, MB, GB, TB)
• Test functionality for both Python and Bash interpreters

**Improvements:**
• Simplified Execution Settings - Executor Type now just selects Python or Bash
• Executable paths moved from per-script to global configuration
• Each script references globally-configured interpreter paths
• More streamlined configuration workflow
• Improved executable validation checking file type and read permissions
• Better user feedback on executable path testing results
• Makefile release target now executes release.sh automatically

**Notes:**
• Global executable paths eliminate repetition across scripts
• Easier to maintain consistent interpreter versions across all scripts
• Better validation prevents misconfiguration issues before script execution

**Version 2.0.0 - Major UI Overhaul & Critical Fixes**

**Critical Fixes:**
• Fixed script settings not persisting to disk
• Resolved XML serialization bug preventing script configuration saves
• Added encryption key initialization in constructor

**UI Enhancements:**
• Complete visual redesign with inline styling architecture
• Added rotating triangle icons for expandable sections
• Implemented active state highlighting with blue glow effect
• Enhanced button sizes for improved usability (36-44px)
• Uniformly styled collapsible sections throughout
• Redesigned event trigger checkboxes as visual cards
• Modernized tab navigation with inline styles
• Converted delete buttons to circular red buttons

**Code Quality:**
• Removed redundant CSS (reduced from 280 to 75 lines)
• Improved maintainability with inline style approach
• Better compatibility with Jellyfin's iframe restrictions

**Note:** This is a major release due to the critical persistence bug fix and complete UI architecture overhaul.

**Version 1.1.2.0 - Radarr HTTP Client Fix**

**Bug Fixes:**
• Fixed Radarr HTTP client Content-Type header issue
• Resolved 'Misused header name' exception when calling Radarr API
• HttpClient now properly handles JSON content headers automatically

**Note:** This version includes the fix for the Radarr integration bug that was causing API communication failures.

**Version 1.1.1 - Optimized Package Size**

**Key Improvements:**
• Reduced download size from ~8MB to ~300KB
• Removed unnecessary dependencies - only includes plugin-specific files
• Server-based API key encryption using Jellyfin SystemId
• Test connection functionality for Sonarr and Radarr
• System-independent encryption that survives OS updates

**Security Enhancements:**
• AES-256-CBC encryption with PBKDF2 key derivation (10,000 iterations)
• Three-component key generation: Plugin GUID + Server ID + Static Salt
• Automatic encryption of API keys on save
• Enhanced security documentation

**Note:** Provides the same security features as v1.1.0 with optimized package size.

**Version 1.0.0 - Initial Release**

**Core Features:**
• Native Sonarr integration with automatic episode monitoring
• Native Radarr integration with smart movie unmonitoring
• Configurable watch percentage detection
• Quality cutoff checking for upgrade-eligible content
• Season-based monitoring control
• Dynamic episode buffer management

**Additional Features:**
• Custom script execution support (legacy feature)
• Comprehensive configuration UI
• Full Jellyfin integration
